main event: On March 19, 1966, a sighting of three unidentified flying objects occurred over Bethesda, Maryland, lasting approximately 45 minutes.
interesting points: Witness observed the objects repeatedly disappearing and reappearing in the sky,The objects emitted a reddish soft light and were compared to the size of Venus,Witness reported that one object accelerated vertically out of sight at an extremely high rate of speed,The sighting was made during daylight hours with no obstruction from clouds,The witness indicated that no sound was heard from the objects, emphasizing their silent movement.
witness description: The witness is a retired Lt Colonel with experience as a pilot and military officer.
